e: ￹`Padeteng~ `sa~`~ `cingra~ `a~ `mi~`takaw~.￺He deliberately stole.￻他專程有意地偷取東西
￹`Padeteng~ `sa~`~ `ko~ `Kawas~ `a~ `mi~`ocor~ `ci~`~ `Yis~ `Kristoan~.￺God deliberately sent Jesus Christ.￻上帝專蓄意差遣耶穌基督
d.f: ￹￺to deliberately do something when it may seem unreason-able * with positive or negative connotations￻專程，故意，有意的舉動看起來似乎毫無理由，蘊含肯定或否定的涵意
